title: 12/11/20 HOUR 3- Tom Curran and Michael Buble
itunes:title: 12/11/20 HOUR 3- Tom Curran and Michael Buble
description:
Tom Curran tells Dan that the difference this week for the Patriots was that they fell behind and then was hurt by Cam Newton. Michael Buble' tells Dan how big a fan he is of the Dan Patrick Show. Michael invited Dan and the Danettes to his live performance.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
